import React from "react" import './DescriptionBox.css' const DescriptionBox = () =>{ return(
Description
Reviews (122)

E-commerce, short for electronic commerce, refers to the buying and selling of goods and services over the internet. It involves a range of online business activities, including online shopping, electronic payments, digital banking, and various other forms of digital transactions. E-commerce has become a significant aspect of the global economy, revolutionizing the way businesses operate and consumers shop.

E-commerce has transformed the retail landscape, providing convenience for consumers and new opportunities for businesses to reach a global market. It continues to evolve with advancements in technology, shaping the future of commerce and trade.

) } export default DescriptionBox
